title: Why do I have to suffer a wait time because of Riot's garbage client?
body:
3 times I accepted queue pop and the game tells me I didn't. When I finally get into a champ select I have one team mate ban my champion and another pick ADC Azir forcing a dodge (who wants to play with someone who can't pay attention in champ select and another trolling?) now I'm forced into a 30 minute wait time because of this client that has been garbage since release???

Why does the world's MOST played game have the world's WORST client?

replies.body: Kids these days. CanÂ´t appreciate the good they get for FREE. Nobody is forcing you to play the game.

Well, technically there is nothing wrong with Riot's client. Currently, the ISP links are having some issues they are trying to resolve. Riot does not own your ISP or any part of Australia's network other than their servers.
